patthana15.88:1.1_0: Saraṇaṁ atītārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naatītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.88:1.1_1: Araṇaṁ atītārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naatītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.88:2.1_0: Saraṇaṁ anāgatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati
patthana15.88:2.1_1: hetupaccayā. Araṇaṁ anāgatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanāgatārammaṇo dhammo
patthana15.88:2.1_2: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
patthana15.88:3.1_0: Saraṇaṁ paccuppannārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo napaccuppannārammaṇo dhammo
patthana15.88:3.1_1: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Araṇaṁ paccuppannārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo napaccuppannārammaṇo
patthana15.88:3.1_2: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
